title: Drawing, Design for Corner Cabinet of Mahogany with Elaborate Backsplash, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Corner Cabinet of Mahogany with Elaborate Backsplash
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
signed: Stamped in faded blue ink, lower left corner of sheet: TO BE RETURNED TO  / H. DAVENPORT. / WASHINGTON ST
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right corner of sheet: Corner Cabinet / of Mahogany; above: L[inverted "U"] / Glass [inverted "U"] [underlined] / EL
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Triangular lower body with 2 glass doors front; raised on 3 tapering legs; elaborately carved backsplash with 3 attaching shelves, the lower one raised on 2 free-standing columnar supports; most shelves hold pieces of china.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Corner Cabinet of Mahogany with Elaborate Backsplash, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-225
